name: Knight Hunt: The Tale of the Tainted Fairy
name_original: Knight Hunt: The Tale of the Tainted Fairy
description:
The game takes place in a decaying world that is blighted with decay, rampant monsters, and desolate landscapes. Creatures like Giant Spiders, Skeletons, and Undead Soldiers are commonplace as the land and everything good in it heads toward a seemingly inevitable destruction.

Keep in mind that this is a group project done by a team of 7 game designers and 2 artists. As we continue to improve on the game, look out for a new build update if you like the material.
